Hello, I need some help, Iam not sure how to copy this to a dvd. I got half in rar files and half in image files. When I extrack one of the rar files it creates an img file thats 4 gb. Every rar file does this. Am I doing something wrong? Please help. Thanks
LOL :) you only need to extract the .rar file, then burn the .img file with nero. in nero chose burn image from the recorder meny, the rest you should be able to figure out. good luck
Does this fit on a regular DVD5??

It will fit a DVD. A Normal DVD will fit something like 4.7 Gigs. If you cannot get the .img file to burn you can also use WinRar (or some other Rar app) to extract the contents and then use nero or even dvdshrink to burn the DVD. Thank again t0rk!
